settings.title: Indistinguishable from Nature

settings.description: A sentence or two introducing your brand, what you sell, and what makes your brand compelling to customers.
A sentence or two introducing your brand, what you sell, and what makes your brand compelling to customers.

As a sustainable brand, sourcing is everything. Fominte's GRS-certified Recycled Sherpa is a dream material for us. It allows us to create beautiful, high-performance jackets while staying true to our ethical commitment.
settings.title: Stella Greene（Founder of Resort Wear Label）

settings.description: We needed a durable, stylish material for our new aviator jacket, and their Bonded Faux Shearling was the perfect solution. The team also worked with us on a custom color match that was flawless. A very versatile and high-performance fabric.
settings.title: Kenji Tanaka（Designer）

settings.description: We chose Fominte's Faux Fox for our new collection of decorative pillows and throws, and the customer response has been phenomenal. The fabric's exceptional softness and rich texture add a layer of cozy luxury that instantly elevates any living space.
settings.title: Mark Chen（Head of Product）

settings.description: The realism of Fominte's faux mink is simply unmatched. The texture and luster are so convincing that it has become the centerpiece of our luxury coat collection. It delivers the opulence our clients expect, without compromise.
settings.title: Julianne Devereux（Creative Director）

settings.description: A sentence or two introducing your brand, what you sell, and what makes your brand compelling to customers.
A sentence or two introducing your brand, what you sell, and what makes your brand compelling to customers.

settings.html:
Faux Fur Collection

Core Capabilities

Applications

Customization

Care Instructions

FAQ

Our Commitment

Our Core Capabilities

A stable and reliable supply chain is the cornerstone of your business. We have established a vertically integrated production base covering approximately 20 acres, integrating R&D, production, and innovation to ensure dependable results.

Strong Production Capabilities>

Scale & Capacity: Our advanced textile production lines grant us a powerful annual capacity, ensuring we can confidently deliver orders of any scale—from hundreds of meters of high-end custom work to hundreds of thousands of meters for mass production.

Vertical Integration: Our control over the entire industrial chain—from fiber R&D, knitting, and finishing to the final product—means we can guarantee stable quality and predictable delivery times from the source. This seamless integration allows for greater flexibility and reliability for your projects.

Global Delivery & Trust>

Trusted by clients in over 120 countries, our extensive experience in international trade guarantees you a smooth and dependable partnership. Our faux fur fabrics are a passport to global luxury markets, and we have a proven track record of meeting diverse international standards. Our experienced logistics team ensures every order is handled with precision, from robust packaging to timely delivery.

Technology & Innovation>

By integrating R&D directly into our production base, we continuously push the boundaries of faux fur design. Our facilities are equipped with state-of-the-art machinery, allowing us to execute complex designs with precision and consistency. Our on-site R&D team enables rapid prototyping and the development of unique, market-leading fabrics.

Sustainable & Ethical Practices>

Our commitment is a pledge to product excellence, environmental stewardship, and ethical practices. We operate in accordance with ISO 9001 and are certified by BSCI, GRS, and SGS. Through these standards, we commit to responsible manufacturing, including the ethical treatment of workers (BSCI) and the use of verified recycled materials (GRS).

Faux Fur Applications

Our faux furs provide the perfect fusion of high-fashion aesthetics, exceptional warmth, and ethical craftsmanship.

Luxury Outerwear>

The Statement Coat: Our long-pile Faux Fox and Faux Mink are engineered to create spectacular garments with dramatic volume and a touch that rivals nature.

The Modern Jacket: Our Faux Shearling and Faux Suede are perfect for crafting iconic moto jackets, aviators, and bombers.

Performance & Warmth: Our dense undercoats and advanced fiber technology provide outstanding insulation and comfort.

Vests & Layering>

Our faux fur materials allow for the creation of chic, commercially successful layering pieces.

The Polished Gilet: Create sleek gilets with our short-pile Faux Rex and smooth Faux Mink, offering warmth without bulk.

The Textured Vest: For bohemian or rustic collections, our Faux Shearling and Faux Fox provide rich textural depth.

Fashion Accessories & Trims>

Elevated Trims: Our materials are engineered for easy integration as collars, cuffs, and hood linings on parkas and coats.

Bags & Footwear: Our durable faux furs like Faux Suede and Faux Shearling are sought-after for chic totes, handbags, and footwear accents.

Winter Essentials: The softness of our Faux Rex and Faux Mink makes them ideal for luxurious scarves, hats, and gloves.

Home & Lifestyle>

Luxe Soft Furnishings: Our faux furs like Faux Fox and Faux Rex are ideal for creating premium decorative pillows and throws.

Upholstery & Accents: Our durable Faux Suede is a fantastic choice for light upholstery projects like accent chairs, ottomans, and headboards.

Faux Fur Customization

Our vertical integration allows for deep customization at every stage, partnering with you to engineer the perfect faux fur for your collection.

Our Customization Capabilities>

Fiber, Texture & Density: We can develop custom textures by manipulating fiber type, pile length, and density to replicate natural fur or create new fantasy textures.

Custom Color Matching: Our advanced dyeing capabilities allow for precise color matching to your specifications, including Pantone standards.

Pattern & Finishing: We can create unique animal prints or abstract designs and offer specialized finishing techniques like shearing, embossing, or sculpting.

Finished Garment (OEM) Solutions: Provide us with your tech packs, and we can manufacture fully-customized coats, jackets, and vests, complete with your branding.

Customization Process>

Our structured process includes: Consultation & Quote, where we discuss your concept and provide a quote/MOQ; Sampling, with a typical lead time of one week; Sample Approval, where we ship the sample for your feedback; and Bulk Production upon approval.

Design Confidentiality>

Absolutely. We treat all custom projects with strict confidentiality. Your design is your intellectual property, and we will never disclose or sell your exclusive patterns to any third party.

Preserve the Beauty of Conscious Luxury

To maintain its exquisite softness, rich texture, and elegant silhouette for seasons to come, proper care is essential. These guidelines will help you and your customers cherish and protect your investment.

Professional Dry-Cleaning Only>

For overall cleaning, we strongly recommend professional dry-cleaning as improper washing can irreversibly damage the fibers and texture. Dry-cleaning preserves the pile and softness, prevents matting, and maintains the garment's shape.

Spot Treatment>

For minor spills, immediately blot the area (don't rub) with a clean, white cloth. Gently dab the stain with a cloth dampened with cool water and a tiny amount of mild detergent, then "rinse" by dabbing with a clean, damp cloth. Air dry completely.

What to Avoid (The "Don'ts")>

To prevent permanent damage, please strictly avoid the following: Do Not Machine Wash, Do Not Tumble Dry, Do Not Iron, Do Not Bleach, and Do Not Apply High Heat or Direct Flame.

Brushing & Steaming>

Brushing: Revive compressed fibers by gently brushing the fur with a soft-bristled brush in the direction of the pile.

Steaming: Use a handheld steamer on low, keeping it at least 6 inches (15 cm) away from the fabric, preferably steaming from the lining side. Never let the hot plate touch the fibers.

Storage>

Proper off-season storage is critical. Use wide, padded hangers to support the garment's shape. Avoid crushing it in an overcrowded closet. Use a breathable fabric garment bag (not plastic) and store in a cool, dry location away from sunlight.

Frequently Asked Questions

How realistic is your faux fur?>

Our faux fur is engineered for exceptional realism, using advanced fiber technology and proprietary finishing processes to create a product that is often indistinguishable from real fur in look and touch.

Does your faux fur shed?>

While all cut-pile fabrics may have minimal initial fiber loss, ours are constructed with a high-density knit backing and advanced finishing to securely lock fibers in place, significantly minimizing shedding.

What is your MOQ?>

MOQ varies. It's typically lower for in-stock fabrics and higher for custom-developed fabrics or finished garments. Please contact our sales team for specifics.

What are your payment terms?>

Our standard term is a 50% deposit before production and the 50% balance before shipment. More flexible terms may be discussed for long-term clients.

Do you ship to my country?>

Yes, 100% of our products are exported. We have experience shipping to over 120 countries worldwide and can arrange reliable shipping to your location.

Our Commitment

Our promise is woven into every fiber we produce. We are committed to delivering unparalleled quality, innovative design, and a partnership you can trust through measurable standards.

Commitment to Speed & Efficiency>

We understand that speed-to-market is critical for your success. Our streamlined process ensures your vision becomes a reality, fast.

Rapid Sampling: We pledge to deliver satisfactory custom samples for your approval within 7 working days.

Reliable Delivery: Once approved, we guarantee that standard bulk orders will be ready for shipment within 30 days. This predictability allows you to plan your collections with confidence.

Commitment to Responsive Service>

Clear and timely communication is the foundation of a great partnership. Our dedicated team is always accessible, ensuring your questions are answered and your project never loses momentum.

Online Inquiries: For messages received via our online chat during business hours, we commit to a response time of under 2 hours.

Email Correspondence: All email inquiries will receive a comprehensive reply within 24 hours.

Commitment to Quality & Partnership>

Beyond speed and service, our ultimate commitment is to the integrity of our product and the strength of our relationship. We stand behind every yard of fabric, ensuring it meets global standards and your highest expectations. We are more than a supplier; we are a dedicated partner in your success, committed to design confidentiality and ethical practices.

CORE ADVANTAGES

Factory & Design

  • 150 Designs/Month
  • 5000+ Patterns Lib
  • 30+ Years Legacy
  • 24/7 Response
OEM/ODM Available

Certified Quality

International Standards

Rapid Turnaround

Value-Added Service

Design & Development

Empower your collection with global trend insights. Our team offers designer collaboration to translate vision into exclusive styles.

Factory Inspection

Your personal account manager accompanies you on every factory audit offering real-time answers and on-the-spot decisions.

Supply Chain

Our robust supply chain can meet any customized solutions, expand profit margins, and help achieve greater returns.
